 Bat probes/Shivah.
Still, the bat probes was wacthing at Lunarpine, when they noticed that he was so close of the base they reported it to Shivah.
Shivah opened com link with Lunarpine ans said in a tone that meaned that he wasn't in mood "If you don't move 200 meters back, I don't leave the base and I'll command to Predacons that kill your friends...!"
  CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...> wrote: Lunarpine stepped back as the shield dropped. this was the moment he'd been
waiting for. He would soon meet the reason for all thier problems. He didn't
know what to expect from either his friends or foes he just hoped that he
could bluff hi way through this.
----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, November 04, 2001 9:21 PM
Subject: Re: a pea in a pod


> Shivah::
>
> Shivah heard when Silverscout moved, he hit one time the pod's door
> and shouted, he knew that the mutant could heard her "You can't
> escape of this pod, so be patient, if all things results right you
> can be fly freely; but if you tried to scape, you will die...
> Understands?"
>
>
> The Lava shields was down. Soon the door will open and Shivah will
> leave the base.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF47
>
> <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Silver Scout acted like a rabid animal biting and slashing at the
> pod. Her systems worked slowly repairing the self inflicted wounds
> that her struggling had caused. In a desperate act she transformed to
> her hawk form and began beating her wings in a futile escape attempt.
> Until her repairs were complete she had little hope of thinking like
> a bot.
>
>
>
>

>
>
